properties.name: enableResponseOutput
properties.description: Whether to provide an additional output branch with the response sent to the webhook

properties.name: generalNotice
properties.displayName: Verify that the "Webhook" node's "Respond" parameter is set to "Using Respond to Webhook Node". <a href="https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.respondtowebhook/" target="_blank">More details

properties.name: webhookNotice
properties.displayName: When using expressions, note that this node will only run for the first item in the input data

properties.name: payload
properties.description: The payload to include in the JWT token

properties.name: responseDataSource
properties.description: Use if input data will contain a single piece of binary data

properties.name: Specify Myself
properties.description: Enter the name of the input field the binary data will be in

properties.name: inputFieldName
properties.description: The name of the node input field with the binary data

properties.name: options
properties.description: The HTTP response code to return. Defaults to 200.

properties.name: responseHeaders
properties.description: Add headers to the webhook response

properties.name: responseKey
properties.description: The name of the response field to put all items in
